thread.title: Melania Trump’s Home Country Honoring Her With New Wine Brand
thread.title_full: Melania Trump’s Home Country Honoring Her With New Wine Brand

author: Randy DeSoto
title: Melania Trump’s Home Country Honoring Her With New Wine Brand
text:
Assange: Clinton Is Pushing For A ‘Pence Takeover’ [Video] 
The First Lady collection also includes salami made from a rare breed of local pig, chocolates and beauty creams. 
While the products are supposedly an effort to honor Trump, TMZ reports the first lady has hired local attorneys to look into the possible unauthorized misappropriation of her title for commercial purposes. 
— 5days in a Monastery (@nodigitalnoise) April 26, 2016 
As reported by Western Journalism , there has been a run on Trump Winery offerings here in the U.S. since the November election. 
“You’ve got people who are buying the wine just to have something to talk about. Some are buying the wine just as a joke on somebody else who didn’t vote for Trump,” said Mike Mackie, co-owner of the Wine Cabinet in Reston, Va. “And then you’ve got people who’ve once they’ve tried the wine, realize it’s a well-made wine. So you’ve got quite a bit of demand.” 
“People who like wine are sort of funny,” Mackie explained with a laugh. “They really don’t care much about your political point of view if they like the wine.” What do you think? Scroll down to comment below. Advertisement Popular Right Now
